name: Puppy Dog vs Sheep
description:
Puppy Dog vs Sheep is a fun puzzle game for all adults and children. It's easy to play, but it also offers tricky puzzles. Play this puzzle game to relax and train your brain.

How to play this game
• This puzzle game uses the rules of Sokoban
• The puzzle is solved when all the sheep are on the right targets
• You have four arrow buttons to move your puppy
• Your puppy can only lead the sheep forward, never back
• Your puppy can only lead one sheep at the time
• Your puppy or sheep can only be moved into the free space
• Your puppy can't jump over sheep or rocks or move rocks
• Your puppy can't swim, so it has to use a bridge to cross the water
• Each move costs you one unit of food
• You have a limited amount of food for each level
• If you are out of food, you can buy more

Puppy Dog vs Sheep features

• 150 challenging puzzles
• Reward for each puzzle
• Cute friendly animals
• Show the solution of the puzzle

You will get many hours of fun with this puzzle game!
